intent: To develop an autonomous drone system for last-mile package delivery in urban areas for a logistics company.
technical_constraints: ROS (Robot Operating System) for drone control
AWS cloud infrastructure for data processing
ambiguities: Detailed package dimensions (only weight is mentioned)
Required accuracy for package delivery (e.g., landing precision)
Specific environmental conditions for operation (e.g., weather, temperature, night/day operations)
Integration points with existing logistics systems
